## RootNode.contains() method

It lets us know whether a node exists in a tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contains(node: RootNode<T>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | [RootNode](./treex.rootnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | a node to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

return true if a node exists in the tree, otherwise return false.
